mapper.select: SELECT A.RN, A.UPLOAD_NO, A.ID, A.UPLOAD_TITLE, A.UPLOAD_CONTENT, A.CREATE_DATE, A.MODIFY_DATE, A.HIT, A.UPLOAD_USER_IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY UPLOAD_NO DESC) AS RN, UPLOAD_NO, ID, UPLOAD_TITLE, UPLOAD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, UPLOAD_USER_IP FROM UPLOAD) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT UPLOAD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO UPLOAD (UPLOAD_NO, ID, UPLOAD_TITLE, UPLOAD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, UPLOAD_USER_IP) VALUES (#{uploadNo}, #{id}, #{uploadTitle}, #{uploadContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{uploadUserIp})
INSERT INTO ATTACH (ATTACH_NO, UPLOAD_NO, ID, PATH, ORIGIN, FILESYSTEM, DOWNLOAD_CNT) VALUES (ATTACH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uploadNo}, #{id}, #{path}, #{origin}, #{filesystem}, 0)
